pageContent:
DEBORAH BARTOO 
Email:  debbielb2@msn.com 
PREFACE 
  I am an experienced consultant with over 25 years of experience as a Configuration consultant specializing in 
implementation, testing, and maintenance of large-scale healthcare payer systems.  I have spent over 20 years 
dedicated to the QNXT software application.  My experience includes involvement in product implementations, 
where I have expertise in QNXT benefits analysis and configuration.  I have extensive experience in many of 
the QNXT modules such as Claims, Provider, Contracts, Benefits, Utilization Management, Provider and Call 
Tracking.  My implementation project tasks include requirements collection, process flow development, 
configuration, testing activities, training program development and classroom training delivery.  I have worked 
with multiple clients and have been involved in all phases of implementation and support, configuration design,

with multiple clients and have been involved in all phases of implementation and support, configuration design, 
troubleshooting, testing activities and training.   My experience has been with Commercial, Medicare, 
Medicaid, Medi-Cal, ASO and EPO lines of business. 
 
FlexTech an Emids Company 
February 2009 – October 2023
